śaktyā vimarśa vapuṣā sva ātmanaḥ unanya rūpayā
śiva ādi kṣiti paryantam viśvam vapuḥ udañcayan
na pārthya gārthakya ātma vārtā api viśva śakti śarīrayoḥ
na viśva viśva vapuṣoḥ bhinna tā kā api tāttvikī

original: bhede sattāsphurattābhyāṃ bhinnaṃ kiṃ nu jagad bhavet |
analyzed: bhede sattā sphurat tābhyām bhinnam kim nu jagat bhavet
sattā sphurat tā sambandhāt sattā bhānam tu tatra ced
asataḥ kim sataḥ tābhyām sambandhaḥ saḥ uyam iṣyate
sva rūpa lābha su lābhaḥ sambandhaḥ na hi avastunaḥ
na labdha rūpa sambandhaḥ tābhyām kiñcid apekṣate
apekṣāyām avasthānam na syāt etasya kiñcana

original: svabhāvataḥ sphurattā ca sattā ca na vināśinī |
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ sphurat tā ca sattā ca na vināśinī
vināśa anabhyupagame jaḍa tā api nivartate
tatas gati antara abhāvāt cit eva pariśiṣyate
tatas cit aikyam prakṛtam jagataḥ na nivartate
prakāśāt anya tā ābhāsaḥ svātantrya ullāsa kevalaḥ
paricchinatti kaḥ śaktim śambhoḥ viśva atiśāyinaḥ
sva prakāśa ātmakam sarvam tamaḥ kevala tām gatam
yat ca kiñcid jagati asmin prakāśāt na atiricyate
vimarśa saraṇīm prāptam iti eṣā tāttvikī gatiḥ
avadhāna ekatānānām matiḥ eva atra sākṣiṇī
kim pramāṇaiḥ varākaiḥ taiḥ cit anuprāṇita ātmabhiḥ
nahi vaikartanam jyotiḥ dīpa ālokam apekṣate  /
śaktipāta pavitre ismin dhī tattve ca parīkṣyatām
ādarśe vimala ābhoge nanu sarvam prakāśate
ittham cit ātmakam sarvam ṣaṭtriṃśat bheda mudritam

original: ādau śuddhātmakaṃ tattvaṃ pañcadhā tamasaḥ param || 14 ||
analyzed: ādau śuddha ātmakam tattvam pañcadhā tamasaḥ param
śivaḥ śaktiḥ ca sādākhyam īśaḥ vidyā iti bhidyate
akṣa ādi śānta varṇa ātmā śivena tu
kalā vidye rāga kālau niyatiḥ bandhaḥ ucyate
māyā pūrvaḥ u vakāra ādi yakāra anta akṣara ātmakaḥ
pumān śaktiḥ manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkṛt mā ādi pañcakam
śrotra ādi pañcakam na ādi ṇa ādi vāc ādi pañcakam
tanmātra pañcakam ña ādi ṅa ādi vyoma ādi pañcakam
sisṛkṣoḥ prathama spandaḥ śivatattvam prabhoḥ smṛtam
icchā eva asya parimlānā śakti tattvam iti smṛtam
sva icchayā racitam viśvam ācchādya ahaṃtayā sthitam
tat eva tattvam sādākhyam sarva anugrahaṇa unmukham
tat eva īśvara tattvam syāt paśyat viśvam idantayā
ahantā idantayoḥ aikya mitiḥ vidyā nigadyate
sva aṅga kalpeṣu bhāveṣu māyā tattvam vibheda dhīḥ
māyā gṛhīta saṃkocaḥ śivaḥ puṃstattvam ucyate

original: ayameva hi saṃsārī jīvo bhokteti gadyate || 22 ||
analyzed: ayam eva hi saṃsārī jīvaḥ bhoktā iti gadyate  /
jña tva kartṛ tva pūrṇa tva nitya tva ādyāḥ ca śaktayaḥ
tad saṃkocāt saṃkucitāḥ kalā ādi ātma tayā matāḥ
māyā ātmanaḥ kalā nāma kiñcitkartṛtva kāraṇam
vidyā kiñcid jña tā hetuḥ rāgaḥ abhiṣvaṅga kāraṇam
kālaḥ pariccheda karaḥ niyatiḥ ca idam eva me
kartavyam na anyat iti eṣā vyavasthā yantraṇa ākṛtiḥ
prakṛtiḥ guṇa sāmyam syāt ahaṅkāra ādi janma bhūḥ
aham mama idam iti etat buddhi hetuḥ ahaṅkṛtiḥ
buddhiḥ adhyavasāyasya kāraṇam niścaya ātmanaḥ
saṃkalpasya vikalpasya bījam manaḥ udīryate
vacana ādeḥ ca śabda ādeḥ vāc ādi śravaṇa ādikam
kāraṇam śravaṇa ādīnām grāhyam tanmātra pañcakam
prakāśa ādi avakāśa ādi kāraṇam bhūta pañcakam
tad anyat aparā śaktiḥ iti etat tattvam īritam
iyam devī parā śaktiḥ śuddha aśuddha adhva garbhiṇī
pṛthivī ādīni tattvāni yadā līnāni kāraṇe
tadā kāraṇa mātrāṇi bahis udvamate vibhuḥ
anuttara icche unmeṣaḥ ānanda īśanam ūna tā
kriyā icchā jñāna śaktīnām sattā ca ucchūna tā ca ṣaṣ
icchā īśana antara ārūḍhāḥ sphuṭa asphuṭa jagat mayāḥ
catvāraḥ paratas varṇāḥ ṣaṇḍha ātmānaḥ pracoditāḥ
anuttara ānanda citī icchā śakti niyojite
trikoṇam atha ṣaṭkoṇam icchāyām rūḍhim āgate
tathā eva unmeṣa yogena kriyāśakteḥ sphuṭam vapuḥ
ukta tri śakti saṃghaṭṭa triśūlam dvaita ghasmaram
parasparā virodhena kāryeṣu prasare gate
na kathañcid upādeyam āsām rūpam idam bhavet
binduḥ vedyasya saṃskāraḥ vimarśaḥ sargaḥ iti asau
kalā ṣoḍaśaka ākārā śaktiḥ viyate parā
tithayaḥ pratipad pūrvāḥ pañcadaśī antimāḥ yathā
sūryācandramasoḥ antar caratni sthiti hetavaḥ
tathā vimarśa vapuṣaḥ sargasya ādyāḥ kalāḥ smṛtāḥ
dvidhā iyam mātṛkā devī bīja yoni ātmanā sthitā
nitya pravṛttā śṛṅgāṭa vapuḥ viśvasya janma bhūḥ
hṛdayam bījam etasyām sāram yat tat param mahaḥ
baṭa bīje yathā vṛkṣaḥ tathā atra nihitam jagat
vicāryamāṇe na eva idam kāraṇāt atiricyate
mṛd ādeḥ kalaśa ādīnām tattvam na anyat nirūpaṇe
iti āhuḥ tattva vādinyaḥ śrutīnām antimāḥ giraḥ
iha sarvam sat eva agre āsīt iti viniścayāt
sattā vācini bīje ismin bhāti māyā antimam jagat
vilupta pratyaya ākāram eva etat pariśiṣyate
tatas jñāna kriyā sārāḥ vidyeśvara sadāśivāḥ
śaktiśūle vilīyante caturdaśa kalā ātmani
ūrdhva adhas sṛṣṭi vapuṣi sarvam līnam atas param

original: itthaṃ parasyāṃ saṃvittau sarvaṃ saṃkucitaṃ kramāt || 46 ||
analyzed: ittham parasyām saṃvittau sarvam saṃkucitam kramāt
atha vāc manasā atīte yatra kvāpi nirañjane
ṣaṭtriṃśat tattva laharī kalaha atīta gocare
viśvātmani mahā mantra svabhāve sā vilīyate
śuddhavidyā ādikam sarvam sādākhye pakṣa saṃgrahāt

original: anyaḥ pakṣo'pi yaḥ kaścit pramāṇaṃ cennabādhate ||]
analyzed: anyaḥ pakṣaḥ api yaḥ kaścid pramāṇam ced na bādhate
kutaścid mathite dhāmni dīpte kena api hetunā
sarvam haviḥ idam juhvan na dāridryeṇa pīḍyate  /
pañca pañca ātmakam viśvam pañca spanda vijṛmbhitam
saṃkocayan parāmarśāt sāmānya spanda kevalaḥ
pralayam kurvan idamaḥ pratiyoginaḥ
parākrama paraḥ bhuṅkte svabhāvam aśiva apaham
iti ṣaṣ adhika triṃśat bheda prasakta jagat tanuḥ
prasarati mahā śakti ullekha vicitra mahā paṭī
jayati bahuśas spanda ākārā parā cit anuttarā

original: vimṛśata janāḥ kiṃ no bhūyaḥ svabhāvavijṛmbhitam || 51 ||
analyzed: vimṛśata janāḥ kim naḥ bhūyas svabhāva vijṛmbhitam
iti śrīmat ādyanātha viracitā anuttara prakāśa pañcāśikā
samāptā
